skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

security_audit.summary: Official skill from an approved source. Minimal audit performed and no security concerns observed in the skill text.

content.value_statement: You need frontend layouts that feel intentional and memorable. This skill guides you to build polished interfaces with strong typography, color, motion, and layout decisions.
actual_capabilities: Provides a structured design thinking process for purpose, tone, constraints, and differentiation
Enforces distinctive typography and color direction to avoid generic aesthetics
Encourages animation and motion choices for high impact moments
Guides spatial composition choices like asymmetry, overlap, and grid breaking
Promotes atmospheric backgrounds and texture details
limitations: Does not include code templates or ready to run components
Does not generate images, fonts, or external assets
Does not validate accessibility or performance automatically
Does not provide backend or data integration logic

use_cases.title: Pitch-ready landing page
use_cases.description: Shape a distinctive visual direction before building a marketing page.

use_cases.title: UI refresh guidance
use_cases.description: Apply bold typography, color, and motion rules to update an interface.

use_cases.title: Brand tone exploration
use_cases.description: Define a memorable aesthetic for a first web experience.

prompt_templates.title: Simple hero section
prompt_templates.scenario: You need a unique hero block
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a hero section for a creative studio. Use a bold aesthetic with distinctive typography, colors, and a textured background.

prompt_templates.title: Landing page direction
prompt_templates.scenario: You want a full page style guide
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a visual direction for a SaaS landing page. Define tone, layout, motion, and background treatments.

prompt_templates.title: Component redesign
prompt_templates.scenario: You must update a UI card
prompt_templates.prompt: Redesign a pricing card set with a non generic aesthetic. Specify typography, spacing, and animation ideas.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced aesthetic system
prompt_templates.scenario: You need a full design system
prompt_templates.prompt: Propose a bold aesthetic system for a dashboard. Include type pairing, palette rules, motion moments, and layout principles.

output_examples.input: Create a distinct look for a boutique hotel booking page.
output: Tone: refined minimal with art deco accents
Typography: display serif for headings, clean sans for body
Palette: ivory base, deep emerald accents, brass highlights
Layout: asymmetric hero with overlapping reservation panel
Motion: slow fade in sections with staggered reveal

best_practices: State the audience and product purpose before visual choices
Commit to one clear aesthetic direction and execute it fully
Use a distinctive font pair and a focused color palette
anti_patterns: Requesting generic modern UI with default fonts

faq.question: Is this compatible with React or Vue projects
faq.answer: Yes, the guidance applies to HTML, CSS, React, and Vue implementations.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill
faq.answer: It provides design guidance only and does not supply assets or full codebases.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my existing design system
faq.answer: Yes, use it to refine typography, color, and motion within your system.

faq.question: Does it handle data safety or user data
faq.answer: No, it does not process or store any user data.

faq.question: What if the output feels too generic
faq.answer: Specify a stronger tone and request bolder typography, layout, and motion.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic UI prompts
faq.answer: It enforces distinct aesthetics and avoids default, repetitive design patterns.
